Header.title: EXPRSL
Header.paragraph: Explore nearby houses,plots and rentals also sell land or houses.

About.paragraph: Our Company is a leading company in realastate . our company main idea is to help users in exploring nearby houses, plots, rentals and lease. our company would be a medium between , the owners who are ready to sell or rent people who are in search of property or home.

Services.name: Exploring rentals
Services.text: Our company helps in exploring rentals in area selected by customers .

Services.text: Our company helps in buying permanent houses with reasonable prices .

Services.name: Sell property or land
Services.text: Our company would be a good medium between persons who are selling property or land and  whoever need them .
